subject: simple get & set function testing
msgSnippet: Hi Can I test get and set functions which contain simple operations? Like, String IP=ipAddress.toString(); return(IP.substring(1)); What are the other method
messageBody:
Hi



Can I test get and set functions which contain simple
operations? Like,

String
IP=ipAddress.toString();


return(IP.substring(1));



What are the other method to test these kind of functions I am
using only assertEqual() to test these kind of function.

Is any other way is available with junit to test these kind of
functions?







With regards
